comment.text: The "CSPInputPlaceholder" translation key is used to display a placeholder message that instructs users to enter a URL in a specific format. This placeholder appears as a text input field in the UI, likely in a dialog or settings page where users configure their Content Security Policy (CSP).

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'URL'yi bu cür daxil edin: https://example.com' is not a natural or accurate translation of 'Enter URL like this: https://example.com'. 'URL'yi' sounds somewhat forced and 'bu cür' is not the most common way to express 'like this'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider a more natural translation such as 'URL-i belə daxil edin: https://example.com' or 'URL-i aşağıdakı kimi daxil edin: https://example.com'.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While not strictly incorrect, 'cür' might be better replaced with 'kimi' for a more standard phrasing.
The backtick character (`) is misplaced and interrupts the sentence flow. It should be removed or repositioned.
While 'Մուտքագրեք' is correct, it might be slightly more natural to use a more informal word like 'Մուտք մի՛ր' depending on the context. However, 'Մուտքագրեք' is perfectly acceptable.
The colon and space after 'URLを入力' could be improved for better readability. While technically correct, it's a bit stiff.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: URLを次のように入力してください： https://example.com

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'vietrādi' is not the correct translation for 'like this' in this context. It means 'in place of' or 'instead of', which doesn't convey the intended meaning.
The Romanian translation includes an unnecessary space before 'https://example.com'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Introduceți URL-ul în felul următor: https://example.com

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'මෙවැනි ඒ.ස.නි. යොදන්න: https://example.com' is not a natural or accurate translation of 'Enter URL like this: https://example.com'. 'ඒ.ස.නි.' is an abbreviation for 'website' (website-la) and using it like this is awkward. A more natural translation would convey the idea of providing a URL.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Try something like: 'https://example.com' වැනි සබැඳිය ඇතුළත් කරන්න (https://example.com) or 'https://example.com' වැනි ලිපිනය ඇතුළත් කරන්න.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'Vnesite URL kot v primeru: https://example.com' is not the most natural way to express the intended meaning. 'Kot v primeru' (like in the case of) sounds slightly awkward.

The translation 'Унеси URL овако: https://example.com' is a literal translation and sounds unnatural in Serbian. A more natural phrasing would be 'Unesi URL kao što je: https://example.com' or 'Unesite URL u formatu: https://example.com'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Unesi URL kao što je: https://example.com

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "输入同类格式的链接 URL" is not the most natural or accurate translation of "Enter URL like this". It's a bit verbose and awkward. A more direct and common translation would be better.
The colon after "链接 URL" is unnecessary and disrupts the flow. It's more common to use a comma or just space.
